name: Social Factor
tagline: Your Digital Agency with Social at the Core
description: WE ARE A SOCIAL AGENCY. We transform digital relationships into real-world ROI for your brand. We are a team of energetic experts who captivate and serve audiences with social media marketing. To help brands take full advantage of social opportunities, we pair seasoned marketing strategists with millennial brand ambassadors to execute on-target social engagements for our clients.
